授業目的:
The purpose of this course is to deepen
students' understanding of marketing and consumer behavior theories and to
further develop the necessary skills for conducting marketing and consumer
research.
到達目標:
Students will acquire the
     necessary research skills and ability to conduct research in marketing.
 Students will develop the
     ability to critically review the literature in the marketing area that
     relates to their research.

トピック.授業計画1: Each class includes individual meetings to discuss the literature related to the student's research topic. We will explore research questions and develop an appropriate methodology to examine those questions. Students should review articles, provide critical analysis of their findings, and include ideas for further research.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students should obtain relevant articles and prepare a critical literature review. Class preparations beyond the assigned readings are encouraged to broaden understanding and contribute constructively to research discussions.
